msg.msgText: The client failed to establish a secure connection to Message Gateway because none of the protocols requested by the JVM is supported. Supported protocols are: {0}

msgExplanation.p: A secure connection can be established only if the JVM configuration includes one of the supported secure protocols.

msgUserResponse.p: Contact your system administrator to request an update to the JVM configuration to include at least one of the supported protocols listed in the error message.
